title: Remove logo box from splash page and app

requirements.summary: Remove the logo box display from the SplashView component
acceptanceCriteria: The logo box element is no longer visible on the splash page
The splash page layout remains visually balanced without the logo
Animations and other splash page elements continue to work correctly

file_operations.description: Remove the logo box element and its associated image reference from the splash screen while preserving all animations, title, description, and the continue button. Ensure the layout remains centered and visually balanced without the logo.

requirements.summary: Remove the logo box display from the main App component
acceptanceCriteria: The logo box element is no longer visible in the main app navigation or layout
The top navigation bar and other UI elements remain properly aligned
All app views (home, manage) continue to render correctly without the logo

file_operations.description: Remove the logo box element and its associated image reference from the top navigation bar. Maintain proper alignment of navigation buttons, user auth controls, and admin controls. Ensure the branding text or other navigation elements remain properly positioned.
